data.Name: Me First
data.Bio: The girl group Me First evolved into a four-person group comprised of two males and two females. Their original sound didn't get lost with the turnover of half the members thanks to the ever-present contributions of drummer Helen Williamson and lead singer Denise Campanaro. Williamson also contributes backup vocals while Campanaro writes songs and plays guitar. Lead guitarist Jon Moldover and bassist/vocalist Chris Lenart round out the group. Since forming in 1995 in San Francisco, Me First have criss-crossed the U. Read more on Last.fm
